body_html: Actually, it's fine, I'm just stupid and forgot to put the log_softmax back in. Not looked at the autograd errors yet. Pushed working version to my branch. @Kaixhin want me to pull request the two lines I put in for cuda handling or will that be handled more elegantly some other way?

body: Actually, it's fine, I'm just stupid and forgot to put the `log_softmax` back in. Not looked at the autograd errors yet. Pushed working version to my branch. @Kaixhin want me to pull request the two lines I put in for cuda handling or will that be handled more elegantly some other way?
